alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 10:15AM EST until November 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga county. The heaviest amounts along and north of Route 104. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
